SNAPP.title: You Don't Have to See It to Tee It
SNAPP.author: Jonathan Kendrick

desc.p: World champion blind golfer Bill Davis has reached the top of his game and is helping others to do the same.

SNAPP.title: L.A. Beekeepers are Raising "Backwards" Bees
SNAPP.author: Jennifer Kendall

desc.p: Two studies found that pesticides might be contributing to the mass die off of bees known as colony collapse disorder. One Los Angeles beekeeper has been teaching people all around the city how to raise bees without using pesticides all along.

SNAPP.title: Relive USC's Win at Oregon
SNAPP.author: Nick Burton

desc.p: With the school year over, get excited for next year and next football season with this look back at the Trojan's thrilling win against the Ducks last November.

SNAPP.title: Parkour: Extreme Fitness For All Ages
SNAPP.author: Bronte Lawson

desc.p: Parkour may be an extreme sport, but it's also a unique way for people of all ages to stay in shape.

SNAPP.title: Food Truck Ban
SNAPP.author: Danica Ruberti

desc.p: In a perfect world, food trucks and schools can work together to fight back against obesity.

SNAPP.title: USC Loses to UC Irvine in Men's Volleyball Championship
SNAPP.author: Kristen Rodgers, James Santelli

desc.p: The USC Men's Volleyball team lost in straight sets Saturday night against UC Irvine in the 2012 NCAA Men's Volleyball Championship.

SNAPP.title: NCAA Men's Volleyball Championship Game Updates
SNAPP.author: Kristen Rodgers

desc.p: Game updates following USC and UC Irivine in the 2012 NCAA Men's Volleyball Championship.

SNAPP.title: TEDx Comes to USC
SNAPP.author: Jillian Angeline

desc.p: Participants of the globally held conference were treated to food, networking and interactive opportunities before the Conference officially began at Bovard Auditorium.

SNAPP.title: Men's Volleyball Advances to National Championship
SNAPP.author: Nick Burton, James Santelli, Eleni Press

desc.p: The Trojans defeated Lewis College in four sets behind Player of the Year Tony Ciarelli.

SNAPP.title: Power Boat Racing Family
SNAPP.author: Jonathan Kendrick

desc.p: For four generations, the Hill family has made its mark in competitive power boat racing.

SNAPP.title: Trojans Want Revenge Against UCI
SNAPP.author: Kristen Rodgers

desc.p: After losing to UC Irvine in the MPSF semifinals, senior Steven Shandrick says the Trojans are looking for revenge.

SNAPP.title: New Kid on the Block
SNAPP.author: Kristen Rodgers

desc.p: The 2012 MPSF Freshman of the Year Micah Christenson will help lead the Trojans through the NCAA Men's Volleyball Championship.

SNAPP.title: Men's Volleyball Preps for Final Four
SNAPP.author: Kristen Rodgers

desc.p: USC will take on Lewis in the 2012 NCAA Men's Volleyball Championship semifinals Thursday.

SNAPP.title: Former Trojan Linebacker Junior Seau Found Dead
SNAPP.author: Eleni Press

desc.p: Oceanside police say the death is being investigated as a suicide.
